column2: When the aircrew member arrives, obtain the appropriate fuel

billing card/information, verify the
fuel grade
to be
issued
with aircrew member and conduct a safety briefing.

Ensure the 150-pound Halon fire extinguisher
is positioned

between the
fuel
servicing vehicle
and the
refueling crew
Give servicing hose and bonding wire to aircrew member for
Ensure the servicing crew member bonds vehicle aircraft.
